name: Kaalakiota Peaks Vodka
description: Usually found on the open market in highly decorated bottles rather than these massive distillation tanks, Kaalakiota Peaks Vodka is made with natural spring water filtered through the volcanic rock of the northern peaks of the mountain range from which it takes its name. This particular container is marked with the shipping number of part of an enormous batch worth more than ten billion kredits that went missing after a Guristas attack in Ikoskio that occurred in November YC117.
